issue.title: [C++] Plasma does not follow style conventions for variable and function names
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2690](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2690). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See discussion in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2031. We should make a pass through Plasma and rename functions and variables to conform with the rest of the codebase

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2690?focusedCommentId=16527766) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Is this also concerns API functions, better to do it sooner than later (perhaps 0.10.0). Otherwise there's no rush.
`[~pcmoritz]`, what do you say?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2690?focusedCommentId=16547179) by Philipp Moritz (pcmoritz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2242
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2242>
